page.title: 16A day in my life(Civilian).2
page.content: First I went down to see 53.When I got there she'd had 11 piglets.I was so ex- cited I ran over to school & told Mrs Pearson, my teacher.Then we had a game of football.We went back into class & got our Domesday Project Map out.We were going to Blackthorn with MissHadd- lesey's class in the school minibus.We had to mark down all the houses,garages & other things.When we got back we wrote up our work until 3pm.When I got home I said Hello to my dad(my mum goes out to work from 10am to 5pm), then I went to the barn & got Flash's food ready.I ran to the gate, opened it & rattled the bucket.He ran to me.I said Hello, took him down to the yard & put him in his pen, then I went to see 53. In the end she had 14 piglets.I got in with them & counted them.There were only 12.I looked in the straw. Two were born dead. (CONTINUED PAGE 17).
